mapper.select: SELECT sub_code, sub_name, col_code, estbl_de, reg_amt, offrum_loc, tel_no, fax_no, grdtn_pnt, staff_no, sub_index FROM subject WHERE SUB_CODE = #{sub_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT A.staff_no, dept_code, A.sub_code, emp_section, encpn_de, retire_de, contract_endde, staff_rspofc, prof_at, name, A.tel_no, regno1, regno2, gen, zipcode, addr1, addr2, email, webmail, account, bank_name, photo_path, DECODE(B.sub_code, null, 'N', 'Y') dean_at FROM staff A LEFT OUTER JOIN subject B ON(A.staff_no = B.staff_no) WHERE A.sub_code = #{sub_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND prof_at = 'Y';
